The claim was shared on Facebook on Marc: 2021, along with a caption in Hindi translating to the death of Bhagat Singh's sister Prakash Kaur.
Bhagat Singh was an Indian revolutionary: 3. The post circulated as Singh's relatives expressed support for the ongoing farmers' protests.
